Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15498607]herpes simplex virus 1(HSV-1):inhibition of HSV-1 infection in MRC-5 cells(IC50=47.3 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide was able to inhibit the entry of HSV-1 into the host cell, probably by blocking heparan sulfate(HS) at the cell surface.

Literature.Title: A wide range of medium-sized, highly cationic, alpha-helical peptides show antiviral activity against herpes simplex virus.
Literature.Author: Jenssen H, Andersen JH, Mantzilas D, Gutteberg TJ.
